```{r setup, include = FALSE}
#Setup knitr
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, background = "gray85",
                      message = FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=6, comment = NA,
                      fig.align = 'center')

knitr::knit_hooks$set(document = function(x) {sub('\\usepackage[]{color}', '\\usepackage{xcolor}', x, fixed = TRUE)})

library("ggplot2")
library("dplyr")
library("skimr")
library("kableExtra")

# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(x = c(.packages(), "ggplot2", "dplyr", "skimr", "lattice", "car",
                       "knitr", "bookdown", "lsr", "corrplot", "jtools"), 
                 file = "packages.bib")
```
